2469: You agree to pay: 1. the premium stated in the declarations for the policy period; and 2. any additional premium resulting during the policy period from: a. the correction or completion of; or b. any changes to; any information on file that affects the premium for this insurance. In Witness Whereof, we have caused this policy to be executed and attested, and, if required by state law, this policy shall not be valid unless countersigned by our authorized representative.
